name: Hedgehog Tree
description:
A game made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 52

Theme: Harvest

Winter is close, and a small family of hedgehogs are preparing for the cold season.

Help little critters to harvest fruits from the legendary Hedgehog Tree.

For your help hedgehogs will allow you to decorate their tree with lots of useful trinkets and introduce you to their friends. Overcome harsh weather and do not allow flying thieves to steal your main ingredients for an autumn cider.

Team:

  • Balakchin Victor - code
  • Goryachev Dmitriy - code
  • Mosin Alexander - gamedesign
  • Scherbakov Alexander - art

Music:

  • Scott Buckley - Glow
